radiographic_examinations.findings: A large thoracic aortic aneurysm in the left hemithorax, small right pleural effusion, bibasal atelectasis/consolidation, mild hepatic steatosis, cholelithiasis with pericholecystic free fluid, multiple subcentimeter cystic lesions in the pancreas consistent with side branch IPMN, bilateral cortical cysts in the kidneys.
radiographic_examinations.changes_over_time: This finding is better characterized on the chest CT dated ___.
